DOC.brief_summary: Most research reveal volatile anesthetic sevoflurane mark cardioprotective effect ischemia compare intravenous agent propofol.However , propofol suggest benefit attenuation surgery-induced immunosuppression.Thus , aim study investigate specific OPCAB surgical stress , influence 3 establish anesthetic technique : sevoflurane , propofol combine sevoflurane propofol maintain anesthesia apoptosis circulate lymphocyte .
DOC.criteria: male adult age 1880 yr undergo elective OPCAB surgery containing leave anterior descend artery bypass previous unusual response experimental anesthetic severe cardiac dysrhythmias ejection fraction 30 % hemodynamic instability previous surgical coronary artery repair anemia , abnormal leukocyte coagulopathy severe hypertension severe hepatic ( albumin < 30g , ascites ) , renal ( serum creatinine great 2.0 mg/dl ) pulmonary ( preoperative pulmonary function test moderatesevere ) dysfunction concomitant surgical procedure psychiatric disorder Insulindependent diabetic
